NAME: Name
CHANGE_REPORTING_CONTENT: Reassign this employee to report to a new manager. Select the desired manager from the available options to update the reporting hierarchy in the organization.
NAME_MIN_LENGTH_ERROR: Name must be at least 3 characters.
DELETE_EMPLOYEE_CONTENT: Deleting {{value}} will reassign all their direct reportees to the employee's manager. Confirm this action to remove this employee from the organization and update reporting hierarchy accordingly.
ADD_EMPLOYEE_CONTENT: Add a new employee who will report to this person.Provide details like Name, Designation, Email and Phone to create their profile in the organization chart.
UPDATE_EMPLOYEE_CONTENT: Update employee details like Name, Designation, Email and Phone to see their profile in the organization chart.
